topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
Our house has security cameras

The people who lived here before we did have three pretty young children, so I can see why they installed it then.

But of course our dad is gonna leave it up. And he can (and will) access the cameras from mobile devices, even when he is halfway across the world on business trips.

The one I'm most annoyed about is the one pointing at the game room. Where I rage over video games a lot. And he hates it when I do that.

[spoiler]So I will either have to control my temper for the next six or seven months before I go off to college (haha nope, as much as I want to I'm waaay too competitive to not rage), or not play at all so that I don't rage.[/spoiler]

On another note, FNaF has ruined me because now I can't see the camera screens without thinking of that. Add the fact that one of the cameras is busted too, and it's just uncanny.

topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549876cf63687205edd70600#post_549876cf63687205edd70600
I honestly feel violated already and I'm not even in a room with one

But not only is it video, they have audio too

So one swear word out of me and it's recorded forever

My family isn't too keen on vulgar language either

This is a great house and all, but the cameras are probably gonna ruin it for me. I think they secretly want me to have a reason to move out as soon as possible.
